name: Blitz (itch) (KellMacartney)
description:
A 3D speed-runner where players are tasked with dodging environmental hazards and defeating enemies in an attempt to achieve a high score. 

15 levels of increasing difficulty

Credits

Produced by Cut Snake productions

Team Lead: Kell Macartney

Lead Artist/ designer: Jenna Bramham 

Lead Programmer/ designer: Ethan Tilley 

Lead Audio Engineer: Bree Pringle
